comment: Generalization rule for restricted quantification. Note that ` x ` and ` y ` are not required to be disjoint. This proof illustrates the use of ~ dvelim . (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 1-Jan-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
